pages.text: Wa La Taqrabu Mala Al-Yatimi 'Illa Bi-Ati Hiya 'Ahsanu Hatta Yablugha 'Ashuddahu Wa 'Awfu Al-Kayla Wa Al-Mizana Bil-Qisti La Nukallifu Nafsaan 'Illa Wus`aha Wa 'Idha Qultum Fa`dilu Wa Law Kana Dha Qurba Wa Bi`ahdi Allahi 'Awfu Dhalikum Wassakum Bihi La`allakum Tadhakkaruna
Wa 'Anna Hadha Sirati Mustaqimaan Fa Attabi`uhu Wa La Tattabi`u As-Subula Fatafarraqa Bikum `An Sabilihi Dhalikum Wassakum Bihi La`allakum Tattaquna
Thumma 'Atayna Musa Al-Kitaba Tamamaan `Ala Al-Ladhi 'Ahsana Wa Tafsilaan Likulli Shay'in Wa Hudaan Wa Rahmatan La`allahum Biliqa'i Rabbihim Yu'uminuna
Wa Hadha Kitabun 'Anzalnahu Mubarakun Fa Attabi`uhu Wa Attaqu La`allakum Turhamuna
An Taqulu 'Innama 'Unzila Al-Kitabu `Ala Ta'ifatayni Min Qablina Wa 'In Kunna `An Dirasatihim Laghafilina

Aw Taqulu Law 'Anna 'Unzila `Alayna Al-Kitabu Lakunna 'Ahda Minhum Faqad Ja'akum Bayyinatun Min Rabbikum Wa Hudaan Wa Rahmatun Faman 'Azlamu Mimman Kadhaba Bi'ayati Allahi Wa Sadafa `Anha Sanajzi Al-Ladhina Yasdifuna `An 'Ayatina Su'a Al-`Adhabi Bima Kanu Yasdifuna
